title: furox looking for scrim partners
body:
furox is a dual team organization with 8 scrim slots per week cumulatively.

if you would like to book a scrim for your team add burstfire303 in game.

we prefer scrim partners with long term scheduling interests but if you just want to scrim us for one night as a test that can be arranged as well.

each one of our scrims lasts 2-3 hours with a minimum of 3 games being played.

if your team is 30 minutes late to a scrim without communicating a reason to either myself (league of legends manager) or the coach of the team you are playing, then the scrim will be cancelled and it may affect future scheduling of scrims with your org.

add me if you have any questions or intentions
burstfire303 - league of legends manager for furox
